title: 5$ rp for someone who finds me a cool sounding short name that's available to name change to.
body:
Names i've tried-

rage

light

wrath

despair

desolation

pride

glory

vexation

blaze

inferno


None of those are available and sound cool.

Find me some thing short and powerful sounding that sounds cool that's available. I'll gift you 5$ rp. Serious.

Go.
